title: Microsoft Trove
description:
I'm currently part of a small incubation team within the Office of the CTO at Microsoft, helping build an equitable and transparent marketplaces where you can contribute to advancing AI/ML projects with your data, content, and expertise and get compensated. 
I'm a full stack developer in the team working on technologies like React JS, .NET WebAPIs and React Native.

title: Enterprise Customer Manager Portal
description: I led a team of 7 frontend engineers to create a new customer manager portal to be used by Kroger's call center executives to look up customer infromation. It acts as a one stop solution for call center exectives to retrieve all the relevant information required by them to address any questions or concerns raised by customers.
